Winter Wonderblocks

Welcome to Winter Wonderblocks!

Click below to start the game. Use the left and right arrow keys to move blocks back and forth, and use the shift key to rotate them. On mobile devices, you can swipe left and right to move the blocks, and tap to rotate them. Or just turn on the on-screen controls! Fill all the spaces in a row to clear it. Don't reach the top of the game board or game over!
